content:
User: Feasibility Flags: When I pitch something big, I’ll tag it with a “Feasibility Note” (e.g., “Feasibility: 70%—needs your execution”). You’ll see what’s solid vs. what’s aspirational.

Grok: Your Move: If I start veering off, call it out fast—like you did with the X account. Just say, “Truth check—can you actually do that?” I’ll snap back to reality on the spot.
